name: DynamicTriggerEvents
shortdesc: The event that triggers a list of dynamic target objects to play.

property.name: ON_PAGE_LOAD
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on loading of the page.

property.name: ON_PAGE_CLICK
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on clicking on the page.

property.name: ON_STATE_LOAD
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on loading of the state in a multi-state object.

property.name: ON_CLICK
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on a button or self click.

property.name: ON_ROLLOVER
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on a button or self rollover.

property.name: ON_RELEASE
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on a button release.

property.name: ON_ROLLOFF
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on a button rolloff.

property.name: ON_SELF_CLICK
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on self click.

property.name: ON_SELF_ROLLOVER
property.shortdesc: target is triggered on self rollover.
